channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-4858|2024-08-03T01:55:45.993Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log Files in M-Files Server before 22.10.11846.0 could allow to obtain sensitive tokens from logs, if specific configurations were set.

item.title: CVE-2022-1606|2024-08-03T00:10:03.558Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Incorrect privilege assignment in M-Files Server versions before 22.3.11164.0 and before 22.3.11237.1 allows user to read unmanaged objects.

item.title: CVE-2022-4862|2024-08-03T01:55:45.786Z -- m-files -- m-files%20new%20web
item.description:
Rendering of HTML provided by another authenticated user is possible in browser on M-Files Web before 22.12.12140.3. This allows the content to steal user sensitive information.
This issue affects M-Files New Web: before 22.12.12140.3.

item.title: CVE-2022-4264|2024-08-03T01:34:49.935Z -- m-files -- m-files%20web
item.description: Incorrect Privilege Assignment in M-Files Web (Classic) in M-Files before 22.8.11691.0 allows low privilege user to change some configuration.

item.title: CVE-2022-4270|2024-08-03T01:34:49.841Z -- m-files -- m-files%20web
item.description: Incorrect privilege assignment issue in M-Files Web in M-Files Web versions beforeÂ 22.5.11436.1 could have changed permissions accidentally.

item.title: CVE-2022-4861|2024-08-03T01:55:45.880Z -- m-files -- m-files%20client
item.description: Incorrect implementation in authentication protocol in M-Files Client before 22.5.11356.0 allows high privileged user to get other users tokens to another resource.

item.title: CVE-2022-3284|2024-08-03T01:07:05.842Z -- m-files -- m-files%20new%20web
item.description: Download key for a file in a vault was passed in an insecure way that could easily be logged in M-Files New Web in M-Files before 22.11.12011.0. This issue affects M-Files New Web: before 22.11.12011.0.

item.title: CVE-2022-1911|2024-08-03T00:17:00.947Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Error in parser function in M-Files Server versions before 22.6.11534.1 and before 22.6.11505.0 allowed unauthenticated access to some information of the underlying operating system.
